properties.name: authkit.jwt_secret
properties.description: The base64 coded string for use as a JWT key

properties.name: authkit.cipher_secret
properties.description: The base64 coded string for use as a CipherService key. This key will use for all internal cipher needs, like secret database entries.

properties.name: authkit.realm
properties.description: Login realm used for isolate same database users form different use cases (used like a domain)

properties.name: authkit.ldaptest.simpleUserName
properties.description: Expected LDAP username, only for testing purpose in ExternalAuthClientServiceTest

properties.name: authkit.ldaptest.simpleUserPassword
properties.description: Expected LDAP password, only for testing purpose in ExternalAuthClientServiceTest

properties.name: authkit.ldaptest.simpleUserEmail
properties.description: Expected LDAP email, only for testing purpose in ExternalAuthClientServiceTest

properties.name: authkit.ldaptest.simpleUserLongName
properties.description: Expected LDAP user long name, only for testing purpose in ExternalAuthClientServiceTest

properties.name: authkit.ldaptest.domain
properties.description: Expected LDAP domain, only for testing purpose in ExternalAuthClientServiceTest

properties.name: authkit.ldaptest.simpleUserSecurGroup
properties.description: Expected LDAP security group, with simpleUser in it. Only for testing purpose in ExternalAuthClientServiceTest

properties.name: authkit.ldaptest.simpleUserDistrGroup
properties.description: Expected LDAP distribution group, with simpleUser in it. Only for testing purpose in ExternalAuthClientServiceTest

properties.name: authkit.redirectToAfterLogin
properties.description: A local (web) path to redirect after login (a target to another controller)

properties.name: authkit.redirectToAfterLogout
properties.description: A local (web) path to redirect after logout (a target to another controller)
